reconnectInterval: Reconnect interval in Seconds for connection to PLC
targetAmsNetId: The AMS-NetId of the target machine
targetAmsPort: The AMS-Port of the TwinCat runtime
targetHost: The IP or Hostname of the target machine
targetTcpPort: The TCP port of the target machine
beckhoffAdapterSettings: Adapter settings for Beckhoff ADS Adapter
validAmsNetIdNeeded: Enter valid AMS Net ID, e.g. 10.0.0.1.1.1
formValidationErrorDescription: Please fill all the needed Setting Fields properly
